channel.title: Anydesk on ForensicXlab
channel.description: Recent content in Anydesk on ForensicXlab

item.title: ðŸ“¦ Volatility3 Windows Plugin : Anydesk
item.description: Abstract Link to heading When performing incident response, the adversary often uses legitimate remote access software as an interactive command and control channel. Anydesk is one of those software. It has been used a lot in the wild in the past years by known threat actors. As an example, it was mentioned in the last year leaked Conti’s manual. We can witness how was the tool installed by the attacker using powershell.
